 technorati_ping ($title, $url, $link)

Function Documentation

technorati_ping ( $  title,
$  url,
$  link 
)

Technorati API -------------- Technorati accepts XML-RPC pings to rpc.technorati.com/rpc/ping. Your XML-RPC message should look like this:

+ HTTP Request Header

POST /rpc/ping HTTP/1.0 User-Agent: YOUR AGENT HERE Host: rpc.technorati.com Content-Type: text/xml Content-length: 250

+ XML message

<?xml version="1.0"?> <methodCall> <methodName>weblogUpdates.ping</methodName> <params>

YOUR WEBLOG NAME HERE

http://www.YOURWEBLOGURL.com/

</params> </methodCall>

+ XML Responses: success

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <methodResponse> <params>

<struct> <member> <name>flerror</name>

<boolean>0</boolean>

</member> <member> <name>message</name>

<string>Thanks for the ping</string>

</member> </struct>

</params> </methodResponse>

+ XML Responses: failure

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <methodResponse> <fault>

<struct> <member> <name>faultString</name>

<string>Description</string>

</member> <member> <name>faultCode</name>

<string>Client</string>

</member> </struct>

</fault> </methodResponse>
